content: if you have any questions please let me know the pdf version of this pattern contains more photos to help guide you through the instructions this pattern is can be made with any size yarn and hook the larger whale is make from chunky yarn you will need * yarn needle * soft toy filling * 3mm crochet hook * dk yarn - approx 80m stitches and abbreviations used * magic_ring - magic_ring/ring single_crochet unless otherwise specified * chain - chain * single_crochet - single_crochet * increase - increase stitch 2 single crochets into one stitch * decrease - decrease stitch single_crochet 2 stitches together * st - stitch * slip_stitch - slip_stitch * r - round or row * fo - finish off *you are welcome to sell items and share pictures made using this pattern but do not sell or share the pattern itself *
